snippet: While it will take years, if not decades, to clean the Gowanus Canal, some local environmentalists are doing what they can to prevent pollution from flowing into the waterway.
abstract: While it will take years, if not decades, to clean the Gowanus Canal, some local environmentalists are doing what they can to prevent pollution from flowing into the waterway.

headline.main: For Local Residents, a Mission to Clean Up the Gowanus Canal
headline.print_headline: Do-It-Yourself, as Applied to a Dirty Canal
